body: In addition, I removed the ability for the `status` command to double as the `note` command because it's an unnecessary special case that causes complications. (Note: The file_type() function was added for future use) --- This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/toxic/31)

comment_data.body: We don't do C99 in toxic?

comment_data.body: This type of ad-hoc enum is a bit sad. You're erasing the information from named "S_IFREG" and turning it into integers with documented but unnamed meaning. Perhaps add an enum for this?
`s` is modified a few lines down

Thank you for your submission, we really appreciate it. Like many open source projects, we ask that you sign our [Contributor License Agreement](https://cla-assistant.io/TokTok/toxic?pullRequest=31) before we can accept your contribution.
You have signed the CLA already but the status is still pending? Let us [recheck](https://cla-assistant.io/check/TokTok/toxic?pullRequest=31) it.
I was looking at the wrong `s`, my bad.
Actually, not rebase, but does need signed commits.
I was going to save that last commit for a separate PR but I figure I might as well throw it in this one since I already started the work.
I've merged #28, so now this needs rebase.
